sentences.sContent: So no one decomposition is sufficient.
sentences.sCn: 因此一种分解是不够的。

sentences.sContent: This is an important difference, because it means that the additional transaction decomposition can be turned on only when required.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is an important difference, because it means that the additional transaction decomposition can be turned on only when required.
sentences.sCn: 这是一个很重要的不同点，因为这意味着仅仅在需要时才进行附加的事务分解。

sentences.sContent: Unlike other decomposition solutions, due to this algorithm, there are no constraints that allow only sibling or child elements/attributes to be mapped to the same table.
sentences.sContent_eng: Unlike other decomposition solutions, due to this algorithm, there are no constraints that allow only sibling or child elements/attributes to be mapped to the same table.
sentences.sCn: 由于有了此算法，与其他的分解解决方案不同，没有只允许将兄弟或孩子元素/属性映射到同一个表的约束。

phrases.pCn: 频谱分解；频谱分析；谱相分解；谱表示
旋节线分解；斯宾那多分解；亚稳态分解，亚稳相分离

words.tran: 再混合的；与混合物混合的

trans.tranOther: Decomposition is the process of decay that takes place when a living thing changes chemically after dying
